title: How to get books onto your Kindle app - Quora

response.answer_text: The format of books on Kindle is mobi. There are two ways to get books on your Kindle.First,  take the pdf of the book that you have and convert it to mobi.  This can done using online converters as well as if you have one installed. Then connect your Kindle to your computer and transfer the book(mobi) file in the books folder and  you are ready to ready the  same.Second, Signin in your kindle using the Amazon account you have and then re-confirm whether the device added is visible from you account on your Computer.If yes, then buy a book(Kindle version) and it will be send to your device using Amazon Whispernet. Just make sure your device is connected to Internet for the same. Hope  this helps you . If you want to transfer  the book to your Kindle app on your smartphone, then login to the app using the  same account and when buying the book select the option to your smartphone. The  option is on the right hand side corner.
